name: Space Clicker (Frontier+)
description:
Idle space clicker game thingamajigger dude.

Nab illegal space aliens and enslave them to work for you in robotic alien slave cluster factories or some weird ass fascistic shit like that. C'mon, like, we all know you're secretly an evil space Nazi. You can't hide that fact...

How to Play

Click the button on the left to do awesome shit. Click the button on the right to automate that awesome shit.

Comments and ratings have been disabled for your own sanity.
